Source.Name: perl-term-size-perl
Source.Summary: Term::Size::Perl - Perl extension for retrieving terminal size (Perl version)
Source.Description: Term::Size::Perl is a Perl module which provides a straightforward way to get the size of the terminal (or window) on which a script is running.

Package.Name: perl-term-size-perl
